name: Creep What You Sow
description:
It's my entry for Ludem Dare 41, theme of "Combine Two Incompatible Genres". This is a stealth based farming sim where you have to avoid dogs while planting and growing flowers (for points), or bushes (to hide in). Don't get caught!

Controls:

  • WASD - move
  • E - change seed type
  • Spacebar - plant / water
